title: Potential Solution in Urban Area to Decrease Flood

content.prompt: Rapid runoff following a heavy rainfall may cause flooding downstream from urban areas. Which urban design strategy will most likely slow water runoff though an urban area and decrease the risk of downstream flooding?

choices.label: Use large flat roofs in new construction
Preserve open areas with intact vegetation
Add large drainage pipes near parking lots

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
